name: Anyplace Control
overview: Anyplace Control Software was founded in October 2002 by a highly skilled team of European I.T. Specialists. Led by Yura Goncharuk, the company provides innovative and efficient networking solutions to both corporate and end-user clients.In all of its software, the business distinguishes itself by providing a unique blend of functional reliability and ease-of-use. This is done by bringing together a wide variety of experts throughout all stages of production, and by combining their knowledge with the latest technological developments and a rigorous program of usability testing. In addition, each product Anyplace Control Software releases is backed up by high-level technical support. At present the company’s Development and Technical Support operations are managed from the Ukraine, while its Marketing, Sales and Public Relations departments are controlled from within the United States.
